name: MAGPagedScrollView
summary: Paged managed scroll view from MadAppGang.
description:
MAGPagedScrollView is scroll view that managed subviews as pages

Custom transitions:
* None - regilar scroll
* Slide
* Dice
* Roll
* Cards
* Custom
